source.bcf87ab2:
from plotly.validators.scatter.marker import SymbolValidator

def plot_time_variation_countries_group(data_df, feature, title, countries):
    data = []
    marker_symbols = ["circle", "square", "hexagram"]
    
    i = 0
    for country in countries:
        df = data_df.loc[data_df.Country==country]
        trace = go.Scatter(
            x = df['Date'],y = df[feature],
            name=country,
            mode = "markers+lines",
            marker_color= 'lightblue',
            line_color= "darkblue",
            marker_line_width = 2,
            marker_size = 9,
            marker_line_color = 'darkblue',
            marker_symbol=marker_symbols[i],
            text=df['Country'])
        data.append(trace)
        i = i + 1
    layout = dict(title = title,
          xaxis = dict(title = 'Date', showticklabels=True,zeroline=True, zerolinewidth=1, zerolinecolor='grey',
                       showline=True, linewidth=2, linecolor='darkblue', mirror=True,
                       tickfont=dict(size=10,color='black'),), 
          yaxis = dict(title = feature, gridcolor='white', zeroline=True, zerolinewidth=1, zerolinecolor='grey',
                       showline=True, linewidth=2, linecolor='darkblue', mirror=True),
                       plot_bgcolor = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)', paper_bgcolor = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)',
         hovermode = 'x', 
         height=500
         )
    fig = dict(data=data, layout=layout)
    iplot(fig, filename='all_countries')

source.45668164: Trend in US is amazing for people fully vaccinated. In Israel we see a saturation and in UK there is an increasing trend, but smaller than in US.
source.8f70e916: Daily vaccination per million evolution is very interesting. It was very large in Jan for Israel, now is decreasing, while in UK fluctuates and US is trending up.
source.3bf66f05: Daily vaccinations decreased in the last period in UK and Israel. The reason might be that most of the population that wants to be vaccinated was already vaccinated. IN US, the trend is still increasing.
source.239dbeae: In terms of people fully vaccinated percent, Israel is at an outstanding 60%, with a saturation trend. Trend is increasing in both US and UK but in both countries the % is still small, under 9% and under 20%, respectivelly, as of April 8.
source.edda8e13: We will plot the time evolution of the vaccination.
